pageContext.claim: “This is a great day for civilization. I am proud of the United States for sticking by me in following a necessary, but somewhat unconventional, path. People have been trying to make this “Deal” [with Turkey] for many years. Millions of lives will be saved. Congratulations to ALL!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is spinning bad news as good news. The Turkish invasion he permitted (which endangered the Kurds in the first place) by removing U.S. troops as a buffer allowed Turkish and Russian forces to sweep into areas held by the Kurds.
